com.lowagie.text.pdf.parser
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  com.lowagie.text.pdf.parser.Matrix

public class Matrix
extends Object

Keeps all the values of a 3 by 3 matrix and allows you to do some math with matrices.

Since:
2.1.4
